seng301.assn4.product

Class ProductController

  • java.lang.Object
    • seng301.assn4.product.ProductController

  • public class ProductController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls all interaction with products of a given kind.
    Author:
    Robert J. Walker

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProductController(org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.hardware.HardwareFacade hf, int index)
      Basic constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProductController

        public ProductController(org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.hardware.HardwareFacade hf,
                         int index)
        Basic constructor.
        Parameters:
        hf - The hardware facade that this controller will use to perform low-level functions.
        index - The index at which the controlled product will reside.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public void register(ProductControllerListener listener)
        Registers the given listener with this controller so that the listener will be notified of events emanating from here.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to be registered. No effect if it is already registered. Cannot be null.

      • deregister

        public void deregister(ProductControllerListener listener)
        De-registers the given listener from this controller so that the listener will no longer be notified of events emanating from here.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to be de-registered. No effect if it is not already registered or is null.

      • hasFreeSpace

        public boolean hasFreeSpace()
        Determines whether the controller has free space for additional products.
        Returns:
        true if there is free space for at least one additional product, else false.

      • load

        public void load(org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.Product... products)
          throws org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.hardware.CapacityExceededException
        Loads the sequence of products into this controller. Produces zero or more ":productAdded" events whose total count arguments equal the number of added products.
        Parameters:
        products - The sequence of products to be loaded. Can be empty. None of these can be null.
        Throws:
        org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.hardware.CapacityExceededException - If there is insufficient free space to load all the products.

      • unload

        public java.util.List<org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.Product> unload()
        Removes all the products from this controller. Produces zero or more "productRemoved" events whose total count arguments equal the number of removed products.
        Returns:
        A list of the unloaded products. Cannot be null. Can be empty.

      • getProductKind

        public org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.ProductKind getProductKind()
        Accesses the product kind for this controller.
        Returns:
        The product kind.

      • getQuantityAvailable

        public int getQuantityAvailable()
        Accesses the count of available products.
        Returns:
        The count of available products.

      • dispense

        public void dispense()
              throws org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.hardware.DisabledException,
                     org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.hardware.EmptyException,
                     org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.hardware.CapacityExceededException
        Dispenses one product from this controller.
        Throws:
        org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.hardware.DisabledException - If the hardware needed for dispensing is disabled.
        org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.hardware.EmptyException - If no products are available.
        org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.hardware.CapacityExceededException - If the delivery is impaired by insufficient capacity.
